meanings.definition: Resembling chalcedony in color or texture.
meanings.sent1: The chalcedonic gem sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was made of chalcedonic stones.
meanings.sent3: The chalcedonic bracelet matched her dress perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The chalcedonic sky reflected in the calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The chalcedonic flowers bloomed in vibrant hues.

meanings.sent1: The chalcedonic mine was a popular tourist attraction.
meanings.sent2: She studied the chalcedonic properties of different rocks.
meanings.sent3: The chalcedonic exhibit at the museum fascinated visitors.
meanings.sent4: His chalcedonic knowledge of gemstones impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The chalcedonic jewelry showcased the beauty of the stone.

meanings.sent1: The chalcedonic rock formation was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The chalcedonic vase was a prized possession.
meanings.sent3: The chalcedonic sculpture stood out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The chalcedonic wall displayed intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The chalcedonic jewelry box held precious gems.
